options: ['John will put the fish into the river.', 'The trout will change into a big fish.', 'John will take care of it at home.', 'The trout will die in the pond.']
questions: What do you think will happen next in the story?
article:
"Look, Mom! What a pretty fish!" said John to his mother.
John's mother asked, "Where did you get it, John?"
"Frank caught it in the river. I went to the river to get some water and saw this little fish. Then I told Frank about the fish, and he ran to get his fishnet  . He put the net into the water, and caught the fish. I put it into this box,"
"Well, what will you do with it?" asked John's mother.
"I will keep it, Mom," replied John.
"But, my boy, it will not live in that box. You should put it back into the river." replied his mother.
John felt sad and said, "I wish I could keep it.  It is so pretty! May I put it into the pond?"
"No, John," said his Mom, "you must put it into the river. A trout   will not live in warm water."
